author: Jo' Pratt
method: Wrap the grated cucumber in a tea towel and squeeze out any excess water. Mix together all the ingredients and serve chilled as an accompaniment to any curry or as a dip for poppadoms.
ingredients: 250ml/8fl oz natural yoghurt,  ½ cucumber, grated or finely chopped,  large handful mint leaves, chopped,  large pinch salt,  ½-1 green chilli, de-seeded and finely chopped (optional)
